title: There was a bug. I won but was judged to be a loser and didn't add any money.

embed.description: Watch and share There Was A Bug. I Won But Was Judged To Be A Loser And Didn't Add Any Money. GIFs by xyzg123 on Gfycat

body: I encountered a bug. I won but was judged to be a loser and didn't add any money.

replies.body: Also encountered this bug. It seems to occur due to the enemy leaving before the combat can be resolved, causing you to never win... and therefore you lose.
